---
title: "UA figure missing alt text"
lang: en
format:
  pdf:
    pdf-standard: ua-2
    keep-tex: true
  typst:
    pdf-standard: ua-1
    keep-typ: true
_quarto:
  tests:
    run:
      # verapdf validation not available on Windows CI
      not_os: windows
    pdf:
      noErrors: default
      ensureLatexFileRegexMatches:
        # LaTeX generates a proper \begin{figure} environment
        - ['\\DocumentMetadata\{', 'pdfstandard=\{ua-2\}', 'tagging=on', '\\begin\{figure\}']
        - []
      # NOTE: verapdf passes because LaTeX's tagging=on doesn't create proper
      # Figure structure elements in the PDF. This is a LaTeX limitation.
    typst:
      # Typst correctly errors at compile time for missing alt text
      shouldError: default
      printsMessage:
        level: ERROR
        regex: "missing alt text"
---

# Test Document

This is a proper figure with a cross-reference label but no alt text.

- **Typst**: Correctly errors at compile time ("PDF/UA-1 error: missing alt text")
- **LaTeX**: tagging=on doesn't create proper Figure structure elements
